summary: Make riften beautiful! Adds over 1000 items to the city.
descriptionHtml:
Make riften beautiful!
====================================================

The second city, of Towns and Villages Enhanced, this time, Riften! 

====================================================

Adds over 1000 items to the city, including:

. Trees
(New trees, Oaks, Red Aspens, and different shrubs! All thanks to Ga-Knomboe\'s mod, GKB Trees.)
. Shrubs
. Alchemist Plants
. General Flora
. Light sources
. Clutter
. Containers
. Seating
. Insects and Animals
. Subtle effects


Experiance a new, super detailed city, with various improvements that enhance your immersion!

====================================================

Important Notes:
This mod is taxing on PC\'s, I recommend using a quad core CPU and a GPU
with at least 1gb of ram. 
4Gb of Ram is also recommended.

I can run a Phenom II X4 965 and Nvidia GTX 560Ti at 35 - 45 Fps without an Enb.

If you encounter any bugs, please note them in the comments or email them
to me at \"aplestormymods@gmail.com\"

This mod should be compatible with most mods that do not create a similar enhancement, it
may well work, but you\'ll have alot of trees and shrubs overlapping and generaly making 
a mess.

=====================================================
Spotlights:

[youtube]QA48iFtlVfw[/youtube]

=====================================================

For the screenshots I\'m using the Realistic Hope ENB.

=====================================================

Please Subscribe, rate and comment! :D All suggestions are welcome!

=====================================================

Others in the Towns and Villages Enhanced series! 

T.A.V.E Villages - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=68336872
T.A.V.E Riverwood - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=75827207
T.A.V.E Whierun Exterior - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=68135774
T.A.V.E Whiterun - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=78084859

Follow me on twitter to keep updated - https://twitter.com/AplestormyMods 

======================================================
author: Aplestormy
